channel.title: Web Development on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: IIT Department Finder Launch (plus personal website domain)
item.description: For IIT admissions, I had created a small command line tool called iit_dep_finder.py to check the departments I would get, given a particular rank. Once the round one allocation results came out, I decided to create a web version, for others to use as well. This article chronicles the steps I took, and while I did get the department finder up and running, I also did a lot of other stuff in the process (including changing the domain name, in case you haven’t noticed :).
